title: Milk Jug With Hinge Cover, mid-18th century
medium: Faience, decorated with high-fire colors, pewter
description: Pyriform jug of pinkish buff paste with greenish glaze. Rounded loop handle; slightly domed cover, covering spout, hinged to handle by pewter hinge. Horn-of-plenty and flowers in blue, green, yellow and iron red, outlined in black.

tombstone.epitaph: Milk Jug With Hinge Cover, mid-18th century. Faience, decorated with high-fire colors, pewter. Gift of Catharine Oglesby. 1958-119-5.
